overview: Sisworo the Jenglotman, married Anggun, the daughter of Mbah Kusumo, a shaman. During five months of the marriage, Sisworo and Anggun were terrorized. Apparently, they were terrorized by Sisworo's own father-in-law. Mbah Kusumo wants the power of the Jenglotman Belt! Like it or not, Sisworo had to fight his own in-laws to be able to live in peace.
title: Jenglotman dan Keinginan Mertua Jahanam
